name: OTAKOYI
tagline: WE TRANSFORM IDEAS INTO DIGITAL PRODUCTS
description:
OTAKOYI is a Ukrainian IT company providing a wide range of digital services. We focus primarily on web and mobile development, and UI/UX design. We can also assist you with quality assurance, DevOps&cloud, project management, SaaS, API and eCommerce development, chatbots, as well as support & maintenance.
Â 
We offer both full-cycle product development and outsourcing/outstaffing solutions.
Moreover, striving to support great initiatives, OTAKOYI works with start-ups following their way up to well-established companies.
